txt.en:
'Many of the men of this town were taken from us, though Elain and I did not notice until the fires were out, the dead buried, and the wounded healed.

'Those horrid Orc-men from Isengard must have kidnapped them for some evil purpose! The White Hand never wanted us to join them... they just want soldiers and slaves for their wicked cause.

'Please, [placeholder]... help us get the men back!'

'Many of the men of this town were taken from us, though Elain and I did not notice until the fires were out, the dead buried, and the wounded healed.

'Those horrid Orc-men from Isengard must have kidnapped them for some evil purpose! The White Hand never wanted us to join them... they just want soldiers and slaves for their wicked cause.

'Please, [placeholder]... help us get the men back!'

'Thank you, [placeholder]! You have helped to restore our village a little. Lhan Tarren will be stronger with the presence of men, weak and useless as these are.\n\n'Perhaps Elain can train them to be more like her....'
Several of the younger men of Lhan Tarren were taken during the raid on the village. They are surely being kept at the half-orc encampment in Trum Dreng.
Freed men of Lhan Tarren from their cages ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Free men of Lhan Tarren from their cages ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The White Hand encampment is in the south-eastern part of Trum Dreng, and this is where the half-orc soldiers retreated with the kidnapped men of Lhan Tarren.\n\nYou should search the encampment for the men and free them as you find them.
Chief Guto can be found in Lhan Tarren, where Elder Riag√°n once stood.\n\nYou should seek out Chief Guto and tell him that you have freed the captured Stag-clan.
